verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

and he said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "Take <S%H3947><s%> for yourself a calf, <S%H5695><s%> a bull, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering <S%H9128><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> [both] without <S%H8549><s%> defect, <S%H8549><s%> and offer <S%H7126><s%> [them] before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"Then to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> you shall speak, <S%H1696><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Take <S%H3947><s%> a male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> and a calf <S%H5695><s%> and a lamb, <S%H3532><s%> both one year <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> defect, <S%H8549><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%>

and an ox <S%H7794><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> for peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, <S%H8002><s%> to sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and a grain offering <S%H4503><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil; <S%H8081><s%> for today <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> to you.' "

So they took <S%H3947><s%> what <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> to the front <S%H6440><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> came <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you to do, <S%H6213><s%> that the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> may appear <S%H7200><s%> to you."

Moses <S%H4872><s%> then said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "Come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to the altar <S%H4196><s%> and offer <S%H6213><s%> your sin <S%H9128><s%> offering <S%H9128><s%> and your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> that you may make <S%H3722><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> for yourself and for the people; <S%H5971><s%> then make <S%H6213><s%> the offering <S%H7133><s%> for the people, <S%H5971><s%> that you may make <S%H3722><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them, just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded. <S%H6680><s%>"

So Aaron <S%H175><s%> came <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to the altar <S%H4196><s%> and slaughtered <S%H7819><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> of the sin <S%H9128><s%> offering <S%H9128><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was for himself.

And Aaron's sons <S%H1121><s%> presented <S%H7126><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> to him; and he dipped <S%H2881><s%> his finger <S%H676><s%> in the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> [some] on the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and poured <S%H3332><s%> out [the rest of] the blood <S%H1818><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

The fat <S%H2459><s%> and the kidneys <S%H3629><s%> and the lobe <S%H3508><s%> of the liver <S%H3516><s%> of the sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> he then offered <S%H6999><s%> up in smoke <S%H6999><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
The flesh <S%H1320><s%> and the skin, <S%H5785><s%> however, he burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> outside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

Then he slaughtered <S%H7819><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering; <S%H5930><s%> and Aaron's sons <S%H1121><s%> handed <S%H4672><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> to him and he sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> it around <S%H5439><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And they handed <S%H4672><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> to him in pieces <S%H5409><s%> with the head, <S%H7218><s%> and he offered <S%H6999><s%> [them] up in smoke <S%H6999><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

He also washed <S%H7364><s%> the entrails <S%H7130><s%> and the legs, <S%H3767><s%> and offered <S%H6999><s%> [them] up in smoke <S%H6999><s%> with the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Then he presented <S%H7126><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>'s offering, <S%H7133><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the goat <S%H5795><s%> of the sin <S%H9128><s%> offering <S%H9128><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was for the people, and slaughtered <S%H7819><s%> it and offered <S%H2398><s%> it for sin, <S%H2398><s%> like the first. <S%H7223><s%>
He also presented <S%H7126><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> and offered <S%H6213><s%> it according to the ordinance. <S%H4941><s%>

Next he presented <S%H7126><s%> the grain offering, <S%H4503><s%> and filled <S%H4390><s%> his hand <S%H3709><s%> with some <S%H4480><s%> of it and offered <S%H6999><s%> [it] up in smoke <S%H6999><s%> on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> of the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

Then he slaughtered <S%H7819><s%> the ox <S%H7794><s%> and the ram, <S%H352><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H8002><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was for the people; <S%H5971><s%> and Aaron's sons <S%H1121><s%> handed <S%H4672><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> to him and he sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> it around <S%H5439><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

As for the portions <S%H2459><s%> of fat <S%H2459><s%> from the ox <S%H7794><s%> and from the ram, <S%H352><s%> the fat <S%H451><s%> tail, <S%H451><s%> and the [fat] covering, <S%H4374><s%> and the kidneys <S%H3629><s%> and the lobe <S%H3508><s%> of the liver, <S%H3516><s%>
they now placed <S%H7760><s%> the portions <S%H2459><s%> of fat <S%H2459><s%> on the breasts; <S%H2373><s%> and he offered <S%H6999><s%> them up in smoke <S%H6999><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

But the breasts <S%H2373><s%> and the right <S%H3225><s%> thigh <S%H7785><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> presented <S%H5130><s%> as a wave <S%H8573><s%> offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> had commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

Then Aaron <S%H175><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> up his hands <S%H3027><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> them, and he stepped <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> after making <S%H6213><s%> the sin <S%H9128><s%> offering <S%H9128><s%> and the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and the peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings. <S%H8002><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting. <S%H4150><s%> When they came <S%H3318><s%> out and blessed <S%H1288><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

Then fire <S%H784><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and consumed <S%H398><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and the portions <S%H2459><s%> of fat <S%H2459><s%> on the altar; <S%H4196><s%> and when all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> [it], they shouted <S%H7442><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces. <S%H6440><s%>
